name: The Lava is Floor
description:
Help baby lava slime learn the slimey ways, all under the watchful eye of mommy slime.  Dash, bounce and be fast so you don't get cold in this action based platformer!

Controls: ⌨ Keyboard🎮 ControllerLaunch baby slimeXRight shoulder (RB / R1)DashXRight shoulder (RB / R1)Move (and aim dash)Arrow keysLeft joystick

Note: Due to some last minute problems you cannot move the big slime, to launch the small slime press "x" or "Right shoulder".
